title: Onboard New Wealth Management Client
description: A new high-net-worth client needs to be onboarded, including KYC checks and risk profiling.

tasks.description: Collect and verify the client's identity documents and proof of address.
Administer a risk tolerance questionnaire to determine the client's investment profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully captures the client's answers and determines their risk profile is 'Growth'.

tasks.description: Open the investment account and link the client's bank account for funding.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the new investment account and initiates the bank account link.
